System Health Report - March 2024
==================================

Service Status: OPERATIONAL
Uptime: 99.97%
Last Incident: None

Performance Metrics:
- API Response Time: 142ms (avg)
- Database Connections: 45/100 (active)
- CPU Usage: 32%
- Memory Usage: 4.2GB/16GB
- Disk Usage: 67%

Recent Changes:
- 2024-03-12: Updated SSL certificates
- 2024-03-08: Applied security patches
- 2024-03-01: Database optimization completed

Recommendations:
- Monitor disk usage trends
- Schedule database index rebuild
- Review API rate limiting configuration
